Fifty four percent of the Federal budget is spent on the military while our infrastructure and industrial base decays. We spend more on military then the next eleven highest spending nations spend combined. For all that, we should be pissed and screaming, not cowering in fear. A laughably transparent conman demagogue like Trump calls the military a 'disaster', and all the suckers just swallow it right up. But I support Trump on one thing, it is time for Germany, France, England, and Japan to pay their fare share of national defense.
